perspective_summary.CNN: Focuses on the impact of Chinese trade practices on American businesses and workers, emphasizing the need for protective tariffs.
perspective_summary.Al Jazeera: Presents a more balanced view, highlighting both sides of the trade dispute and its effects on global markets.
perspective_summary.Global Times: Frames US actions as protectionist and harmful to global trade, emphasizing China's commitment to free trade.

topics.key_differences: CNN emphasizes US economic security concerns, while Global Times portrays US policies as destabilizing. Al Jazeera takes a more neutral stance.
